title: Ronald Reagan hit Jimmy Carter in a land slide, even though he's swaying 6% in Bulls?
subtitle: The claim that Reagan won the presidential election in 1980 in a crushing collapse despite the fact that he fell far behind Carter in late public opinion polls was cited as a reason to go out and vote for Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Ronald Reagan won the 1980 presidential election in a crushing collapse despite Jimmy Carter's tracking of public opinion polls two weeks ago, so opinion polls cannot be trusted to predict election results.
